summary: An undercover cop struggling to provide for his son and ailing wife, must infiltrate a ruthless gang. But things turn sour when another cop blows his cover and he quickly finds himself battling for his life and the lives of his family.
cast: Jet Li|Anita Mui|Miu Tse|Rongguang Yu|Collin Chou|Ken Lo|Hen-Chow Lo|Damian Lau|Bonnie Fu|Henry Fong|Mary Ellen Dunbar|Victoria Hoffman|Martin Spanjers|Fred Tatasciore|Brad Sergi|David Graf|Karen Maruyama|Tim Lounibos|Michael Sorich|Dean Scofield|Mark Klastorin|Evan Cohen|Brady Kimball|Derek McGrath|Arianna Ratner|Yuk Wah Cheung|John DeMita|Blackie Shou Liang Ko|Tom Konkle|Yuen-Fan Ng|Wing-San Tang|Corey Yuen|Bing Lei Li|Thorsten Nickel|Paul Rapovski
